the parameter changed from model 118 into 345 for negative value support

calc of interest for type 615 (only first percenatge is used)

including updates
21.06.2005 EE SCR#8510 Usage of GNRL/GSET changed to read only/no cache:

04.11.2004 JJ SCR7283 GSET62 replaces hardcoded 360 days if >0

24.11.2003 JJ SCR4846 codebasis 5 for PL calc with 365 days per year else 360
Revised vesrsion of BPH117, using different method to calculate and store
every slide separately
For calculation purposes a year has 360, 365 or GSET(62) days
get one row before PI.DATEFROM
-- Calculate percentage
... in case of PI.TYPE = 615 only one percenatge is used, so call BAD019 only
once
... in all other cases where multiple percentages are used we have to calculate
the average percentage for the calculation period
range: descending
only one row needed so end task condition yes after
presumable there will always be a row <= PI.DATEFROM
Start values for first slide
Last slide up until PI.DATEUNTIL
Set for next slide
-- In case of PI.TYPE = 615 use for all days the interest percentage which is
valid on the highest date <= PI.DATEFROM, to avoid problems with
replacement schedules
